titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to rescind guidelines and ensure the removal of signs and guidance relating to the COVID-19 pandemic.
To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to rescind guidelines and ensure the removal of signs and guidance relating to the COVID-19 pandemic.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to immediately rescind all guidelines relating to the COVID-19 pandemic. The VA must also ensure all signs and posted guidance related to COVID-19 are removed from its facilities (e.g., signage related to masking and social distancing).
